what: Linear regression with clustered robust standard errors
title: Linear regression with clustered robust standard errors
text: package used fit linear regression models cluster robust standard errors across high-dimensional phenotypes assess change time.

title: Linear regression with clustered robust standard errors
Linear regression with clustered robust standard errors
text: lmrse: fits linear regression model cluster robust standard errors markers. coerce.lmrse: coerces lmrse results single data.frame.

title: Linear regression with clustered robust standard errors
code: ## Libraries library(lmrse)  ## Data   y <- rnorm(5000000) y <- matrix(y, ncol = 1000) # a matrix of phenotypes (rows = individuals, columns = markers) colnames(y) <- paste0("pheno", 1:1000) x <- rnorm(5000) # a vector of exposure cluster <- rep(1:1000, 5) # cluster variable c1 <- rbinom(5000, 1, 0.5) # covariate 1 c2 <- rnorm(5000) # covariate 2  ## Analyses   res <- lmrse(y ~ x + c1 + c2, cluster = cluster) summary(res) results <- coerce.lmrse(res)

title: Linear regression model with cluster robust standard errors — lmrse
Linear regression model with cluster robust standard errors — lmrse
code: ## Data y <- rnorm(5000000) y <- matrix(y, ncol = 1000) colnames(y) <- paste0("var", 1:1000) x <- rnorm(5000) cluster <- rep(1:1000, 5) c1 <- rbinom(5000, 1, 0.5) c2 <- rnorm(5000)  ## Analyses res <- lmrse(y ~ x + c1 + c2, cluster = cluster)
